remove duplicate sentence in second paragraph

Telcos don't make First Amendment arguments.
/* Advocates and opponents */ There's no proof that they don't! Why should we have a default position of distrusting the pro-neutrality side? Fine. This better?
/* Advocates and opponents */ no real proof that these people exist
/* Pro-regulation websites and articles */ noted that SavetheInternet has over 1'000'000 signatures, that's pretty notable.
/* "Dumb" versus "Intelligent" networks */ clarified the meanings of the terms. "Intelligent" is easily interpreted to be inherently superior.
